sentences: Vargamäe Andres võttis juba hoogu kõrtsist minema hakata, kui Pearu saksatoast nähtavale ilmus.
Ta võttis hoogu ja läks tööle.
Poisid võtsid hoogu ja hakkasid laulma.
context: In Estonian, 'hoogu' is the partitive case form of 'hooa', which relates to taking or gathering something internally. It's used when someone collects their courage, strength, or determination before doing something difficult or challenging. The word suggests an internal process of preparation and summoning inner resources.
